name: On-the-Glow Lip Balm Trio
about: What it is:A limited-edition set featuring three full sizes of the fan-fave Lip Glowy Balms in Berry, Gummy Bear, and Vanilla..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness.Formulation:Balm.Highlighted Ingredients:- Shea and Murumuru Seed Butters: Moisturize and nourish..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. They are also vegan and gluten-free..What Else You Need to Know:Hydrate your lips on the go and reveal glowy, juicy lips! These lightweight, moisture-coating lip balms contain murumuru seed and shea butters to smooth, soften, and hydrate lips throughout the day..This Set Contains:- 3 x 0.35 oz/ 10 g Lip Glowy Balms in Berry, Gummy Bear, Vanilla.Clinical Results:Based on an independent consumer study of 50 women between the ages of 18-35, after 1 week:
ingredients: -Shea and Murumuru Seed Butters: Moisturize and nourish...Berry:.Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Polybutene, Phytosteryl Isostearyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Mica, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Euphorbia Cerifera Cera/Cire De Candelilla, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Synthetic Wax, Fragrance/Parfum, Candelilla Wax Esters, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Methicone, Dehydroacetic Acid, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire De Carnauba, Red 6 (Ci 15850), Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Water/Aqua/Eau, Propanediol, Lycium Chinense Fruit Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Extract, Sapindus Mukorossi Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Fragaria Chiloensis (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Rubus Chamaemorus Seed Extract, Phenoxyethanol..  .Gummy Bear:.Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Polybutene, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Phytosteryl Isostearyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Mica, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Euphorbia Cerifera Cera/Cire De Candelilla, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Synthetic Wax, Fragrance/Parfum, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Candelilla Wax Esters, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Methicone, Dehydroacetic Acid, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire De Carnauba, Red 7 (Ci 15850), Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Tocopherol..  .Vanilla:.Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Polybutene, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Phytosteryl Isostearyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Mica, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Euphorbia Cerifera Cera/Cire De Candelilla, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Synthetic Wax, Fragrance/Parfum, Candelilla Wax Esters, Dehydroacetic Acid, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Methicone, Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire De Carnauba, Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Limonene, Tocopherol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply directly to lips as needed..-Use alone or before lip color to prime or after lip color for shine.

reviews.review_title: Great for dry lips that just need some Love
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to have really dry lips to the point of bleeding especially in the October - February months. But ever since I have been applying this maybe once a day my lips have been nourished more than with any other products I've tried I definitely recommend it to anyone who has extremely dry lips or anyone who just wants non sticky hydrated lips, and the flavors are really good too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best value! Berry one is my favorite  Makes my lips feel extra hydrated. This is a great stocking stuffer or perfect to stock up for the whole year

reviews.review_title: amazing lip product i will repurchase until i die.
reviews.review_text: This lip product is amazing, it will help me a lot because my lips are like always dry and it helps me a lot.

reviews.review_title: Will definitely keep this in my purse

reviews.review_text: Fantastic deal! I love Laneige products and thought this would be a perfect gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Can't go wrong with this set, especially on the 20% off sale! The only downfall is the vanilla which has absolutely no scent or flavor but I don't really mind enough to return it. Still a great value.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a present and I LOVE it! It smells so nice and really helps with my dry lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product it's better than the midnight minis in my opinion. The smell is of course perfect. Hydrates my lips, but after awhile it kinda gets dry again. It's actually worth the price and I would buy it again.

reviews.review_title: Over hyped not worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought the product made my lips appear softer and smoother, however after continued use, I see no improvements, it's the opposite, my lips appear dry and cracked, I have to keep applying lip gloss and for the price.. No good.. I will go back to regular Carmex n get the same results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ooohh laneige you will never get disappointed super soft and moisture lips with gloss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No a fan. Doesn't last long and left my lips cracked.

reviews.review_title: vanilla's applicator is akward to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love it, very good quality but the applicator of the lip balm is pretty akward to use (it's kind of twisted?)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My first time trying this formula. I have been wanting this for a while and I couldn't pass up this kit. Olehenrickson lip balm is my go to. In terms of hydration and longevity, it is amazing. However it is thick and sticky and it can be uncomfortable. This balm is so light weight and it feels amazing! It doesn't last as long as but for how light weight it is, it is incredible. Depending on my needs, I have found my two holy grail daytime lip balms. This set is a good deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this! 3 of my favorites together!  not to mention the $20 cheaper than buying them separately!! 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this set my only issue is the vanilla one ...it smells like nothing. I adore vanilla but this one doesn't smell like vanilla at all. The other one smell really good especially the gummy bear it's really good ðŸ’œ

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip balm and I like these over the sleeping masks. The balms are more moisturizing for me and omg the scents are soooooo juicy while being subtle. Gummy bear is my favorite it smells like grape gum/jelly. I want to say berry smells like skittles. And vanilla isn't too heavy which i like since I don't really like gourmand scents. The value of this set is incredible and the selection of flavors is perfect! I now feel the need to buy every flavor!   Summer Fridays is too strong and sweet for me where they go for gourmand scents. I like how Laneige scents are more fruity and has mild sweetness to it I feel like it's perfect for people who don't like to eat super sweet things but enjoy the smell of them if that makes sense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this since it was such a good deal, 3 for the price of 2. However, there's a bonus that's not mentioned on the site. I didn't read anything on the actual packaging since I didn't expect any surprises, and was just messing with the box for fun. If you open the box fully instead of just taking the balms out of the front, there are a couple of sample creams! I love having these for travel, so it was a pleasant find.
